pageContext.claim: “95% of Americans will pay less or, at worst, the same amount of taxes (mostly far less). The Dems only want to raise your taxes!”
pageContext.analysis: An analysis by the Tax Policy Center found that while this is initially correct, within ten years 53 percent of taxpayers would experience a tax increase, compared to only 25 percent who would have lower taxes. Democrats supported tax cuts, but objected to the deficit-financed tax reductions.
